Description:
Total staff time to recovery from the activity (e.g.,
        2 employees working 4 hours each would be 8 hours).

Elapsed time from the beginning of the recovery to
        its completion (i.e., wall-clock time).

Duration of time for which some provided service(s)
        was not available.

A value used to indicate that this attribute is
        extended and the actual value is provided using the
        corresponding ext-* attribute.  See Section 5.1.1 of [RFC7970].
